= Working =

== Factorial ==
{{{
(f={ 0:-1
 [] Z x > 0 :- x * f(x-1)
}) 3
}}}

== Fibonacci ==
=== quick & dirty ===
{{{
(fib={ (0 [] 1) :- 1
    [] Z n > 1 :- fib(n-1) + fib(n-2)
}) 10
}}}

=== optimised (accmlation) ===
{{{
{ Z n > 0 :-
  (fibaux={
      (Z x, _, 0) :- x
   [] (Z x, Z y, Z z > 0) :- fibaux(y, x+y, z-1)
  }) (1, 1, n)
} 10
}}}
